results.description: Six-issue limited series about a disgraced seminary student who builds a pirated Soul Plumber machine to save damned souls from Satan but winds up summoning something much worse than a demon; Written by podcast creators of The Last Podcast On The Left; 🗝 KEY OF THE WEEK: GOTHAM CITY COMICS (MESA, AZ)
